value:
$WmMPID_魔器ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_M_Weapon01,Face|Syrene, circle around the forest
from the right!$k$p$WmMPID_シレーネ,ch08_34_Sirene_Normal,Face|I've determined all enemy locations,
so I shall move in to slow them down!$k$p$WmMPID_魔器ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_M_Weapon01,Face|Vanessa, follow behind me! We need
to neutralize the mages.$k$p$WmMPID_ヴァネッサ,ch08_33_Vanessa_Normal,Face|Understood. I'm with you!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Let's not allow this opportunity to
pass. Follow Princess Tana!$k$p$WmMPID_ギリアム,ch08_32_Gilliam_Normal,Face|Allow me to lead the charge on land.
May the sight of the knights of Frelia
be burned into your eyes, bandits!$k$p$WmMPID_魔器ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_M_Weapon01,Face|Well done, everyone. But don't let
your guard down! We can put an
end to this swiftly if we keep focus!$k$p$WmMPID_シレーネ,ch08_34_Sirene_Normal,Face|What a splendid show of leadership
from Princess Tana. I am proud to
see how much she has grown.$k$p$WmMPID_ヴァネッサ,ch08_33_Vanessa_Normal,Face|She's able to skillfully lead her allies
in the midst of battle...$k$p$WmMPID_ギリアム,ch08_32_Gilliam_Normal,Face|A magnificent example of royalty. She
is a far cry from the princess who
snuck out of the palace in secret.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ヴァネッサ,ch08_33_Vanessa_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|Commander!$k$p$WmMPID_シレーネ,ch08_34_Sirene_Normal,Face|Oh, Vanessa. You were injured in the
battle earlier. Are you all right?$k$p$WmMPID_ヴァネッサ,ch08_33_Vanessa_Normal,Face|Yes, ma'am, you need not worry.
It was little more than a scratch.$k$p$WmMPID_シレーネ,ch08_34_Sirene_Normal,Face|I am relieved to hear that. Also, you
know you don't need to be so formal
when we're alone. I'm your sister.$k$p$WmMPID_ヴァネッサ,ch08_33_Vanessa_Normal,Face|Yes, ma'am! But more importantly—
Syrene, have you seen Princess
Tana anywhere?$k$pI haven't seen her since the battle
ended, which has me worried...$k$p$WmMPID_シレーネ,ch08_34_Sirene_Normal,Face|Actually, the princess has—$k$p$WmMPID_魔器ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_M_Weapon01,Face|Hello, Syrene and Vanessa! What are
you two chatting about?$k$p$WmMPID_ヴァネッサ,ch08_33_Vanessa_Normal,Face|Princess?! Well... I hadn't seen you in
some time and grew concerned, so I
was reporting your absence...$k$p$WmMPID_魔器ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_M_Weapon01,Face|Oh, no need to worry about that! I let
Syrene know ahead of time that I'd
be away for a while.$k$p$WmMPID_シレーネ,ch08_34_Sirene_Normal,Face|Be that as it may, it would put me
more at ease, Princess, if you took
me or Vanessa with you on outings.$k$p$WmMPID_魔器ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_M_Weapon01,Face|I promise it's OK. I'm not sneaking
out of the castle again or putting
myself in danger. Please don't worry.$k$p$WmMPID_シレーネ,ch08_34_Sirene_Normal,Face|All right... I understand.$k$p
